title: [FR] Filter input should hide all connections excluding those match input
author: filimonic
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Filter input should hide all connections excluding those match `*input*`

## Expected Behavior
Like `TERMINALS`:
Having servers connections named 
`FS-LONDON-01, FS-WARSAW-01, <25 other FS-* for other cities>, DC-LONDON, DC-WARSAW, <25 other DC-*>`
When typing to filter field "LONDON",  I want to see only 2 items in a list: DC-LONDON and FS-LONDON.

## Current Behavior
Currently there is no filtering. I can not find ...

comments.snippet: Thanks I am working on that bit already, thanks for reporting. Should be perhaps released in new version once finished with major issues fix.
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: If you search for something you can use the arrow keys (up/down) to get to the next/previous item of your search.
comments.author: LIyoai

comments.snippet: when can this "dynamic search filter" feature be expected in a release?
comments.author: fuco809

comments.snippet: cant promiss for 1.77.3 but potentialy in 1.77.4
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: Triage (P3 stale status): this issue is labeled as actively worked, but activity appears stale. Please confirm whether work is still in progress. If not, please relabel to Need 2 check (or close) to keep status labels accurate.
comments.author: robertpopa22

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels.
